title: Which true of child high self efficacy for soccer

content.prompt: Which of the following is true of a child with high self-efficacy regarding her ability to play soccer?

choices.label: She believes she has played poorly if she does not score a goal.
She feels confident that she can play well enough to score a goal.
She wants to score more goals than any other girl on her team.
She plays soccer well only as long as she is interested in soccer.

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
